effects: Physical damage (6.5x, DEF) to one enemy
Reduce resistance to Fire by 50% for 3 turns to one enemy
Increase chance of being targeted by 100% for 4 turns
Reduce damage taken by 40% to caster for 4 turns
name: Frost Purge
Frost Purge
百鬼·秋霜的破邪
백귀·추상의 파사
Lames purgatrices
Eisklingentanz
Sables de hielo
desc_short: Damage and reduce fire resistance for one enemy, temporarly increase chance of being targeted, and reduce damage taken by self for four turns
攻擊1名敵人+降低火屬性耐性的數值+暫時性容易被敵人攻擊+4回合內減少對自身的傷害
적 1명에게 피해+불속성 저항력 감소+사용자가 일시적으로 적의 공격 대상이 될 확률 상승+4턴 동안 피해량 감소
Dégâts, réduit la résistance au feu d'un ennemi, augmente temporairement les chances d'être ciblé, et réduit les dégâts subis par le lanceur pendant 2 tours
Fügt einem Gegner Schaden zu und verringert seine Feuerresistenz + erhöht kurzzeitig die Wahrsch. angegriffen zu werden und reduziert vier Runden lang selbst erhaltenen Schaden.
Daña y reduce la res. al fuego de un enemigo, aumenta la probabilidad de ser atacado temporalmente y reduce el daño que recibe el usuario durante 4 turnos
